column2: Andrew! Thanks for your review of JINYA. We
column4: have noticed many Japanese-Americans (and quite a few Japanese tourists) coming to try our ramen. For what it's worth
column5: their predominant ramens-of-choice are: Tonkotsu Black
column6: Tokyo Yatai and Tonkotsu Assari. And most recently
column7: one Japanese guest taught us the word for hard noodle: "katamen." Thanks for coming to our shop and we hope to see yall again in the near future!
